statements: DELETE FROM remote_work_expenses WHERE id = 100 AND reimbursement_amount > 500
DELETE FROM remote_work_expenses WHERE reimbursement_amount BETWEEN 100 AND 500
DELETE FROM expenses WHERE id = 1 AND amount > 1000
DELETE FROM approvals WHERE approver = 'John Doe' AND approval_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM expenses WHERE submitted_by = 'Alice' AND submitted_date < '2022-03-15'
DELETE FROM receipts WHERE date < '2022-01-01' AND amount > 1000
DELETE FROM approvals WHERE status = 'Pending' AND manager_id = 123
DELETE FROM reimbursements WHERE approved_by = 456 AND amount < 500
DELETE FROM receipts WHERE receipt_id = 1001 AND employee_id = 2001;
DELETE FROM approvals WHERE approval_id IN (SELECT approval_id FROM reimbursements WHERE payment_date < '2022-01-01');
DELETE FROM reimbursements WHERE approval_id IN (SELECT approval_id FROM approvals WHERE status = 'rejected');
